forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow this afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow this afternoon. High 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Decreasing cloudiness late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 29F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 29F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
